contextId.occurrenceNote: This is a euphemism. Alternate translation: "If a man has sexual relations with her" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])
contextId.glQuote: If a man lies with her

contextId.occurrenceNote: This is a euphemism. Alternate translation: "no other man has had sexual relations with you" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])
contextId.glQuote: no other man has lain with you

contextId.occurrenceNote: Here the word "thigh" is a polite way of referring to the woman's womb or her private parts. Alternate translation: "your womb to be useless" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])

Possible meanings are 1) that the woman will become unable to have children or 2) that the woman's pregnancy will end too early and the baby will die. Here the word "thigh" is a polite way of referring to the woman's womb or her private parts. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate/figs-euphemism See how you translated these concepts in [Numbers 5:21](../05/21.md).]])
contextId.glQuote: Her abdomen will swell and her thigh will waste away

contextId.occurrenceNote: This is a polite way of referring to when a person kills someone. Alternate translation: "I killed" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])

This is a gentle way to say that Aaron must die. It means that it is time for Aaron to die and for his spirit to go to the place where his ancestors are. Alternate translation: "Aaron must die" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])
contextId.glQuote: Aaron must be gathered to his people

contextId.occurrenceNote: This is a euphemism that means Moses will die and his spirit will go to the place where his ancestors are. Alternate translation: "you must die" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])
contextId.glQuote: you, too, must be gathered to your people

contextId.occurrenceNote: "has had sexual relations with a man" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])
contextId.glQuote: has known a man by lying with him

contextId.occurrenceNote: "who have not had sexual relations with any man." This refers to girls who were virgins. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])
contextId.glQuote: who have not known a man by lying with him

contextId.occurrenceNote: "women who had no had sexual relations with a man." This refers to women who are virgins. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-euphemism]])
contextId.glQuote: women who had not known a man by lying with him
